title: Step 1
desc: From android 11 and above substratum cant make changes to layout. So it wont work like the way it used to be on android 10!
desc1: You have to request a custom magisk module from the developer for this theme to work! all thanks to google. This module will help you change lockscreen clocks using madness substratum theme.
